title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement a secure login system with multi-factor authentication and role-based access.
description: Design and develop a robust authentication system that allows customers to securely log into the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication methods such as OTP, email verification, or biometric options. Incorporate a role-based access control mechanism to ensure each user accesses only authorized services based on their profile and permissions. Focus on adherence to banking data security and privacy standards for all user access points.

title: Responsive and Intuitive User Interface
summary: Create a responsive and user-friendly interface for desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms.
description: Develop a modern front-end framework with responsive design principles to ensure that the banking portal provides a consistent experience across various devices. The interface should be intuitive, visually clean, and accessible for users of all proficiency levels. Prioritize usability testing to ensure that navigation, page loading, and interactive components perform efficiently on different screen sizes and resolutions.

title: Personalized Dashboard Experience
summary: Provide a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
description: Implement a customizable dashboard that dynamically displays information and banking services tailored to each user’s profile, eligibility, and preferences. Integrate logic for product recommendations, recent account activity displays, and quick access actions. Ensure dashboard data is securely fetched in real time and aligns with the customer's portfolio within the core banking system.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable users to open accounts and modify services via streamlined digital workflows.
description: Develop online forms and guided workflows to allow customers to open new accounts, update service details, or submit modification requests. Introduce intuitive form design, progress indicators, and automated data prefill features to reduce interaction time. Implement backend processing to route requests through proper approval channels and provide feedback loops through integration with internal systems.

title: Document Upload and Application Continuity
summary: Allow secure document uploads and enable saving incomplete applications.
description: Introduce secure file upload functionality to let users provide necessary documentation for various banking activities. Add the capability for users to save incomplete forms and return later to finalize submissions. All uploads and temporarily saved data must be encrypted and adhere to the organization’s retention and privacy policies.

title: Real-Time Request Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide live request status updates and automated email notifications.
description: Implement request tracking features whereby users can monitor the progress and status of their service requests and account openings. Integrate a notification framework to send customers real-time updates via email or in-app alerts at key milestones such as submission, approval, or completion. This ensures transparency and enhanced customer satisfaction.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with core banking services for synchronized data.
description: Develop secure, standards-based APIs or middleware to integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking system. The integration should enable data synchronization for customer accounts, transaction history, and eligibility validations. Ensure all integrations are designed for bidirectional communication with real-time updates and robust error handling.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create a dedicated portal database for improved performance and reliability.
description: Establish an independent database to handle portal-specific data, reducing load on the core banking system. Implement optimized indexing, caching strategies, and data synchronization pipelines for high performance and uptime. Incorporate backup and failover mechanisms to guarantee resilience and business continuity even during maintenance activities.

title: Data Security and Privacy Management
summary: Implement encryption, secure storage, and compliance measures for sensitive data.
description: Integrate strong encryption mechanisms for data in transit and at rest to protect sensitive financial and personal information. Establish data privacy controls consistent with relevant regulations (such as GDPR or local banking compliance standards). Implement auditing and monitoring systems to detect and respond to unauthorized access or potential data breaches rapidly.

title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain an accessible history of customer interactions with secure logging.
description: Develop a module that records all user actions within the portal, such as service requests, document uploads, and changes to profiles or accounts. Ensure that customers can view their interaction history while maintaining detailed audit trails for administrative reviews. Implement proper data retention policies, delivering transparency and accountability in line with regulatory compliance.
